committer Masaki Hara <ackie.h.gmai@gmail.com> 1494765470 +0900

Disallow underscore suffix for string-like literals.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@

+
+fn main() {
+    let a = "Foo"_; //~ ERROR string literal with a suffix is invalid
+}
